Texts.Eng: A book covering the monsters of the mod.

Abyss Wisp(ID - abysswisp)
The abyss wisp is the dark variant of the wisper, and near players, it will shoot abyss shots. They are normally encountered in the ^#666666;dark abyss^reset; planet. Currently, there is no collection associated with this monster.
Health - 30
Resistant to - Abyss
Weakened by - Ion

Abysspod(ID - abysspod)
The abysspod is the dark variant of the pteropod, and near players, it will shoot special projectiles that shoot more projectiles. They are normally encountered in the ^#666666;dark abyss^reset; planet. Currently, there is no collection associated with this monster.
Health - 48
Resistant to - Abyss
Weakened by - Ion

Ancient Avatar - continued
into more lightning bolts.
Drops -
^orange;Ancient Blaze^reset;

Ancient Avatar(ID - ancientavatarstatue and/or ancientavatar)
The Ancient Avatar is essentially a reskin of the Kluex Avatar. It has the exact same attacks except for some new ones.
Health - 148500
New Attacks -
Ancient - Shoots ancient plasma balls a the player.
Poison - Spawns poison clouds that rain down poison.
Electric - Shoots lightning bolts downwards that eventually explode

Ancient Drone(ID - ancientdrone)
The ancient drone is a minion created by the Ancient One. They will attempt to swoop down at the player.
Health - 48
Resistant to - None
Weakened by - None

Ancient Fragment(monster)(ID - ancientfragment)
The ancient fragment, not to be confused with the item, is a minion created by the Ancient One that orbits around the boss shooting projectiles at the player.
Health - 48
Resistant to - None
Weakened by - None

Ancient Sentry(ID - ancientsentry)
The ancient sentry is a minion created by the Ancient One. They behave exactly like the kluex sentry.
Health - 60
Resistant to - None
Weakened by - None

Ancient Totem(ID - ancienttotem)
The ancient totem is a minion created by the Ancient One. They behave exactly like the kluex totem.
Health - 250
Resistant to - None
Weakened by - None

Bot of Terror - continued
fast projectiles that bounce around the arena.
Tesla Attack - Rapidly shoots lightning at the player.
Drops -
Tons of pixels(100%)
^blue;Super Tesla^reset;(100%)

Bot of Terror(ID - cyberboss)
The Bot of Terror or B.O.T. is the current final boss of this mod. It can be encountered in the Robot Facility.
Health - 59400
Resistant to - Mega Damage
Weakened by - None
Attacks -
Missile Attack - Shoots homing missiles at the player.
Laser Attack - Shoots two laser beams that sweep the arena.
Minion Attack - Summons Drones of Terror.
Richochet Attack - Shoots 1 to 2 really

Dark Batong(ID - darkbatong)
The dark batong is the dark variant of the batong, behaving exactly like a batong. They are normally encountered in the ^#666666;dark abyss^reset; planet. Currently, there is no collection associated with this monster.
Health - 50
Resistant to - Abyss
Weakened by - Ion

Dark Fennix(ID - darkfennix)
The dark fennix is the dark variant of the fennix, and it shoots abyss fire near the player. They are normally encountered in the ^#666666;dark abyss^reset; planet. Currently, there is no collection associated with this monster.
Health - 50
Resistant to - Abyss
Weakened by - Ion

Dark Ignome(ID - darkignome)
The dark ignome is the dark variant of the ignome, and it attempts to ram at the player when hostile. They are normally encountered in the ^#666666;dark abyss^reset; planet. Currently, there is no collection associated with this monster.
Health - 50
Resistant to - Abyss
Weakened by - Ion

Darkoise(ID - darkoise)
The darkoise is the dark variant of the crustoise, and it attempts to ram at the player when hostile. They are normally encountered in the ^#666666;dark abyss^reset; planet. Currently, there is no collection associated with this monster.
Health - 50
Resistant to - Abyss
Weakened by - Ion

Darkpin(ID - darkpin)
The darkpin is the dark variant of the pulpin, and it rapidly shoots abyss fire at the player when hostile. They are normally encountered in the ^#666666;dark abyss^reset; planet. Currently, there is no collection associated with this monster.
Health - 40
Resistant to - Abyss
Weakened by - Ion

Drone of Terror(ID - cybermini)
The drone of terror is a minion created by the Bot of Terror that will fly at the player.
Health - 80
Resistant to - None
Weakened by - None

Explosive Quantum Minion(ID - explosivedestroyerminion)
The explosive quantum minion is a minion created by the Quantum Sentry. It will shoot explosive projectiles at the player.
Health - 3
Resistant to - None
Weakened by - None
Extended Story - Monsters

codex.ivguidemonsters.supervoidboss.attacks

Flying Golem(ID - golemflying)
Not what you think they are. These monsters will initially take on the appearance of a pile of rocks. It will then transform into its attack form and will try to kill you. They can be found in the ^#666666;dark abyss^reset; planet. Currently, there is no collection associated with this monster.
Health - 80
Resistant to - Fire
Weakened by - Poison

Lost Soul(IDs - apexlostsoul, avianlostsoul, floranlostsoul, humanlostsoul, and hylotllostsoul)
You know what I said earlier about the screaming in the ^#666666;dark abyss^reset;? Yep! They exist. Their behavior is exactly like the Spookit, and they appear in 5 variants. They are encountered in the ^#666666;dark abyss^reset; planet. Currently, there is no collection associated with this monster.
Health - 45
Resistant to - Physical
Weakened by - None

Melee Quantum Minion(ID - meleedestroyerminion)
The melee quantum minion is a minion created by the Quantum Sentry. It will swoop down at the player.
Health - 48
Resistant to - None
Weakened by - None

Omega the Quantum Sentry - continued
Minion.
Teleport - Teleports around.
Mega Laser - Shoots a giant laser.
Swoop Volley - Performs three swoops in quick succession.
Plasma - Similar to the delayed plasma, but with different projectiles.
Drops -
^green;Super Redeemer^reset;(100%)
^red;Black Hole Cannon^reset;(rare)
Cyber Core(100%)

Omega the Quantum Sentry(ID - truedestroyer)
Omega the Quantum Sentry is a boss monster that is tier 10 and is encountered in the Limbo Dimension.
Health - 29700
Resistant to - None
Weakened by - None
Attacks -
Delayed Plasma - Rapidly shoots balls of plasma at the player.
Swoop - Swoops down at the player.
Minions - Explosive Quantum Minion, Melee Quantum Minion, Ranged Quantum Minion, and Orbital Quantum

Orbital Quantum Minion(ID - orbitaldestroyerminion)
The orbital quantum minion is a minion created by the Quantum Sentry. It will orbit around the Quantum Sentry and shoot projectiles at the player.
Health - 48
Resistant to - None
Weakened by - None

Ranged Quantum Minion(ID - rangeddestroyerminion)
The ranged quantum minion is a minion created by the Quantum Sentry. It will shoot projectiles at the player.
Health - 3
Resistant to - None
Weakened by - None

The Ancient One - cont. 2
Laser Attack - Shoots laser beams at the player in different patterns similar to the Erchius Horror.
Drops -
Fusion Core(100%)
Dark Matter Core(rare)
Ancient Fragment(many)
Ancient Essence(100%)

The Ancient One - continued
totem(that's what they're literally called)
Slam - Moves above the player before slamming into the ground. Again like how Dreadwing does it.
Teleport - Teleports randomly around the arena.
Ancient Pulse - Sweeps across the arena and shoots ancient pulses downwards
Rapid Delayed Plasma - Shoots plasma at the player rapidly for 10 seconds.
Rainbow Shots - Shoots a lot of cell blast projectiles at the player.

The Ancient One(ID - ancientboss)
The Ancient One is a boss monster that is tier 10 and can be encountered in the Limbo Dimension.
Health - 12375
Resistant to - None
Weakened by - None
Attacks -
Delayed Plasma - Circles around the player, spawning auto-targeting plasma shots for 5 seconds.
Swoop - Swoops down at the player like how Dreadwing does it.
Minions - Spawns an ancient drone, ancient sentry, or ancient
